author: Dr David Bell
description:
Abortion is a complex moral issue. But when vaccines and medicines are developed from research using aborted foetuses, we should at least be told, says Dr David Bell. Conscience must be respected.

The post Tearing Bodies Apart on the Altar of Science appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Tearing Bodies Apart on the Altar of Science

author: Eugyppius
description:
Stefan Niehoff, the German pensioner famous for a meme calling Robert Habeck a moron, has been found guilty of five criminal retweets and one criminal reply and fined €825. He promises to appeal.

The post German Pensioner Who Called Green Politician Robert Habeck a Moron Found Guilty of Five Criminal Retweets and Fined €825 appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: German Pensioner Who Called Green Politician Robert Habeck a Moron Found Guilty of Five Criminal Retweets and Fined €825

author: Will Jones
description:
Spain's disastrous national blackout in April was triggered by solar farms switching off in response to plummeting power prices, an official investigation has found.

The post Solar Power to Blame for Spain’s Disastrous Blackout, Official Investigation Finds appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Solar Power to Blame for Spain’s Disastrous Blackout, Official Investigation Finds

author: Will Jones
description:
Foreign nationals are responsible for more than a quarter of sex assaults on women successfully prosecuted in Britain despite being just 11% of the population, official figures obtained via FOI have revealed.

The post Foreign Nationals Convicted of Quarter of Sex Assaults on Women appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Foreign Nationals Convicted of Quarter of Sex Assaults on Women

author: Will Jones
description:
Opponents of the decriminalisation of abortion have vowed to fight on to block it in the Lords after MPs last night approved allowing women to abort their own unborn children for any reason, using any method, up to birth.

The post Campaigners Vow to Fight “Disastrous” Abortion Decriminalisation in Lords After MPs Approve Allowing Women to Abort Own Unborn Children Up to Birth appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Campaigners Vow to Fight “Disastrous” Abortion Decriminalisation in Lords After MPs Approve Allowing Women to Abort Own Unborn Children Up to Birth

author: Clive Pinder
description:
The West’s Cold War-era doctrine of mutually assured destruction relied on rational actors. Iran is not rational, says Clive Pinder. It is eschatological. Islamism is not a deterrable enemy. It is a theological death cult.

The post Iran is Not Rational. It’s Part of the Islamist Death Cult appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Iran is Not Rational. It’s Part of the Islamist Death Cult

author: Ben Pile
description:
Sceptics lose all their scepticism when faced with claims the Government could block out the Sun, says Ben Pile. But this is no less a delusion of grandeur than the idea human CO2 emissions are controlling the temperature.

The post Why Do Sceptics Abandon Scepticism When Faced With Claims the Government Could Block Out the Sun? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why Do Sceptics Abandon Scepticism When Faced With Claims the Government Could Block Out the Sun?
